stronghold.translation[0].definitions[0]: an area where there is a lot of support for a particular way of life, political party etc
The area is a Republican stronghold.
stronghold.translation[0].definitions[1]: an area that is strongly defended by a military group
The fighters moved south to their mountain stronghold.
stronghold.translation[0].definitions[2]: an area where there are large numbers of a rare animal
one of the last strongholds of the European wolf
